segments.text: This is the good life ! We have it good don ’ t you think ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah of course ! Although , don ’ t you ever wonder what could have been ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , sometimes I think of how things could have turned out if I had done things a little differently .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Like for example , if I hadn ’ t studied architecture , I would have become an artist like I wanted to .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . Yeah now that I think of it , I wouldn ’ t have gotten married if I hadn ’ t moved to this town and met Sally .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You see ! Everything happens for a reason ! We wouldn ’ t even have met if I hadn ’ t been in that car accident ten years ago !
segments.speaker: S2
